website_summaries.verdict: An affordable model by a top brand that provides the perfect combination of convenient features and value.
pros: Very easy to install and clean
Has quick-release hinges so you can remove and replace it with ease as needed
Available in several colors and in elongated and round styles
cons: The mounting hinges can be difficult to tighten, which makes the seat wobbly
Not quite as durable as pricier options

customer_reviews.title: Poorly design bracket (see photo). Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The bracket are designed in a U shape, regardless how we tighten it down, the seats moves around. Very poorly designed and non-functional. This one is going back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap (no pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. The mounting hardware makes it impossible to tighten enough to keep the seat from moving around. The bolt is metal but the nut is expanding plastic (by design) that strips easily. I could marginally tighten one side but the other side was stripped from the get go.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: If there was a "minus star", I would have used it!! The mounts on this seat are worthless. Kohler says it's made to remove for cleaning! Who removes a toilet seat to clean it?? Their wonderful "easy removal" system would allow the seat to pop out of the mount while you're sitting on it, no matter what they say. I tried to use this with a riser for my 85 yr old mother in law and the mount failed before I got it tightened. I had to duct tape the riser and seat to the toilet until I get a new one. I would not recommend this seat to anyone because of the mounts!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these seats to replace ones that the builder had put in our house. These are light years better than those Bemis seats from a cleaning perspective alone. I personally prefer plastic over painted wood because they are way easier to clean and sanitize AND they don't get all warped if you use a cleaner with bleach. These also don't have a gap between the fasteners when the seat is up so it prevents stuff from falling into that little hard to clean area between the fasteners which is my LEAST favorite part to clean. I would highly recommend these seats.
customer_reviews.author: Travelsinheels

customer_reviews.title: Entirely PLASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and then ordered two of these because after four years of light use in a new home, the Kohler toilet seats looked dirty, but upon closer inspection, the paint was worn off. No idea how that happened... must have been defective from the start. Shame on Kohler. Anyway, these arrived and I was not expecting an entirely plastic product. They simply seem cheap and flimsy to me. Returning and ordering something better.
customer_reviews.author: S M.

customer_reviews.title: No, no, No! Avoid this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this seat to replace one on a Kohler toilet. The supplied attachment hardware is a stainless steel screw and a nylon nut that needs compression/tightening before it holds. Could not get it to hold. Wasted an hour of frustration. Switched to a stainless steel nut and washer (that I happen to have ). Will complain to the company on Monday. There is a video from Kohler about a kit to secure your wobbly toilet seat. They lost me at “45 mins, 2 drills, 7/8 socket” etc. It’s 2018. We put men on the moon 50 years ago and the engineers from Wisconsin have not yet done their job.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I thought it was the same model we used to have in our old place. The new Bemis "easy clean" ones that came with our new house do not clean...pee stains. We did not have this staining issue with our old Kohler ones. But these are not the same ones, or they changed their product. So far it cleans fine. But the quality of the seat is so light and cheap. It was $14 so I guess you get what you pay for. But I'd rather pay twice that amount and just get a decent toilet seat that cleans well and doesn't feel like a flimsy piece of plastic. Why can't anyone make a good toilet seat?
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: If it's not one thing that breaks, it's another
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toilet seat to replace the original one because the lid cracked. Literally less than a year after installing it, the screws used to hold the seat on have become loose. I've looked into getting new toilet screws and they are half the price of a new seat. What I want to know is how companies are able to get away with making products that break with short-term use. Things aren't like they used to be. SMH
customer_reviews.author: mermo

customer_reviews.title: I knew this was a light weight seat
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking seat and very inexpensive. It is not heavy duty. I knew this before I bought it. However, I caution anyone considering this seat for their bathroom. It is not intended for use by a big person. My husband, for example, commented that it's flimsy. But I purchased it for my bathroom off of the master bedroom. It's not in a bathroom that will get a lot of use by a lot of different people. I wouldn't have purchased it for his bathroom as he's a big guy at over 225#. It is not meant for everyone. Just keep that in mind when you make a decision.
customer_reviews.author: SunBug

customer_reviews.title: Good match
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the negative complaints about this toilet seat I didn't know what to expect. Take reviews with a grain of salt. I watched a one minute YouTube video and had it installed in 10 minutes. It doesn't move around or shift, there is an adjustment where the bolts go in so maybe people didn't notice that and it fit perfectly. The biscuit color also matched perfectly. Maybe it's just me but a lot of whiners about a $20 toilet seat.😯
customer_reviews.author: Bootsz

customer_reviews.title: All plastic.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I needed but it's not high quality. It was easy to install and seems good quality for what it is. I knew I was ordering plastic so it wasn't a surprise what showed up, but it is a little "squeaky" when sat on. It fit my dual-flush (non kohler) toilet very well, the measurements seem accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more. Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Small family in 2 bathroom home and hardly home much with activities and work and this seat hasnt even made it to 6months without completly breaking. The plastic screws that attach the seat to the toilet dont hold snug and have already completely snapped. Completely disheartened in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: April Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Light weight plastic
customer_reviews.text: Upon installation I must have tightened the screw and nut too strongly and one of the covers over the screw broke off. It wasn't hard to install but I wish it had warned me to not over-tighten. It seems sturdy enough for sitting and has been easy to wipe clean. It probably will last a few years but it is not as heavy as some seats and probably will not last as long. It was the least expensive so I wasn't sure what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy PP

customer_reviews.title: not well designed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 2 years and have to agree with other reviews- the number of times this seat has started sliding off just from sitting on it is outrageous and it’s because the little U shaped mounts are terrible. I even bought specialty extra long screws to try and help because I thought my bidet was the problem but it didn’t help. This seat comes off constantly. Am actively looking for a new seat even though this one isn’t broken... just won’t stay at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Borg

customer_reviews.title: Nice and stable
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy, stable seat at a good fair price. If your lid seems to be spring loaded so that it won't stay open, it is simply because one of the hinge pins slid out of place during shipping. This appears to be a minor design flaw. When the seat is not engaged on it's mounting bolts, it is easy to correct this problem by sliding the black plastic hinge pin into the correct location so that it does not twist with the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Tim the tool man

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, won't stain, lil' wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of the wood lids. Had wood lids on our new toilets, after 6 months the stains locked in. So, bought these plastic lids. Easy to install, you need a Phillip's #2 screwdriver, that's it. Torque them down tight(ish). I admit , they wobble slightly more than wood, but worth the "no stain" tradeoff. The seat does have rubber bumpers that keep in place while sitting. No more wood.
customer_reviews.author: Hicks

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: i should have known if there was a video to just drive to home depot and purchase a simple seat...still not on...great reviews from others...not from me. seriously just go to lowes or home depot... then the nuts are metal but the piece to hold it together is plastic... too much of nothing..not as simple as the video make it...still trying to secure the cheap plastic to the screw.. update... still a piece of garbage...it does not stay connected....iam 5'8 and 150 it has nothing to do with weight or size...it just does not work...sorry....if i could do no stars I would..how about the one star for the color...
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: If you have a young boy read this first!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For most people this toilet seat is fine. However if you have a young boy dont get it. We all know young boys are learning to control their ureatha. Well the design of this toilet seat harbors urine. For days I could smell urine even after cleaning the toilet. I finally removed the seat and found tons of dried urine under the plastic part at the bottom of the seat. This area is open in many seats. I have to remove the toilet seat to clean with this seat. It's a pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and functional, but don't expect too much
customer_reviews.text: Just received the item and installed it. The plastic seat is not very sturdy and not made to fit exactly. The lid moves around because the lid to seat connection does not match exactly. I did not have problems with screwing in the toilet seat to the toilet. There was no need to screw in too tightly. The seat bends when I sit down on it and I weigh less than 170 lb. So for someone heavy, the seat may be stressed to breaking point sooner than later. It would have been great if it had 2 more legs/pillar where the seat bending occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but so lightweight it feels odd
customer_reviews.text: I switched to plastic after getting tired of wood seats looking terrible after less than a year of normal cleaning product use. I'm sure the difference between the weight of the wood and the weight of the plastic just takes getting used to, but it does seem oddly insubstantial. Works perfectly well, though. I like that the hinge hardware is all enclosed. It's easy to clean and doesn't discolor from bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Truver

customer_reviews.title: Defective Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: Totally disgusted with this purchase. I should have opened the box it came packaged in when it arrived. Now it is too late to return it. Two large dark marks across the toilet seat lid. How that could have gotten past whoever boxed it up is beyond me. Now I am thinking that it why it was priced as low as it was. It should have stated up front if it wasn't first quality. I feel totally taken advantage of.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Dancing Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and sturdy - Except for the following: It has a 'Quick Release Seat' - invoked by merely pulling the seat out. I know the intention is good - but the plastic slips that expand to keep the seat aligned allow the front of the seat to move around - left or right. Disconcerting. The other problem is that the installation bolts are skinny metal machine screws that conspire with the problem above to allow the seat to skid around a bit - as the thin machine screws are way smaller than any toilet's holes for seat mounting, thus causing a lot of wiggle room
customer_reviews.author: AJ Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Not a Soft Close Toilette Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: Product shows up as the 4th result for the search result "soft close toilet seat elongated". Nowhere in the description does indicate that it's not a soft close.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Osterman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This toilet seat is a name brand. It lools great and is easy to keep clean. However this seat was installed and in use less than 3 months when the flimsy plastic pieces that held the cover in place shattered. The rest remains useable. The lid/cover not so much. Purchased the name brand but totally disappointed. Buy another product. This one is not made to last more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: mystery shopper star

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, value and appearance
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, Light weight but will still slam shut if not lid is dropped. But wont damage toilet or the seat. I got the biscuit color which is beautiful. Just a hint of off white to compliment the off white paint and tiles of most standard painted homes. Easy to install and has a quick detach feature for easy cleaning if needed. Because of the design I don't foresee having to remove it more than a couple times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Easily cleaned, but cover snapped within 2 months of install.
customer_reviews.text: Only been installed a couple of months and the cover broke off. It always seemed loose, but then it broke. The little black plastic things broke into a bunch of pieces. Only got closed about once a week when I cleaned it, so it wasn't used a ton. Otherwise, I really like the design of the seat so I can clean it thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer11

customer_reviews.title: Worst product ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product that I have ever purchased in my entire life. It doesn't matter how much you tighten it the seat just moves around and then it just pops off completely. I feel like this is some sort of a gag item.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper Than The Original Kohler Seat!
customer_reviews.text: We built a lovely home 14 years ago and purchased 4 Kohler toilets. They are still beautiful, but one seat was scratched. I should have know that a 2020 replacement would not be as nice. They are much lighter and flimsy. In fact, all the current replacements have thin molded seats. These are not the sturdy and substantial seats that we first purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and super easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why anyone complained about the sturdiness of this unless they weren’t installing it correctly. Mine took less than 5 mins to install and is very sturdy. Pops off easily to clean which I love. I also purposely bought an all plastic seat because the wood and metal ones get so nasty. The metal ends up flaking and the paint on the wood wears off. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MariaAna

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm. Hardware is missing from box. Also--try as ...
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm. Hardware is missing from box. Also--try as I might--I can't get the 2 hardware area covers to pop off. I'm using this for an art project, so I don't mind how cheapy-flimsy it is, but if you want an actual toilet seat, get a different model.
customer_reviews.author: PickyShopper

customer_reviews.title: The name Kohler says it all!
customer_reviews.text: We have put the plastic Kohler seats on every toilet in our home and HIGHLY recommend...fantastic look...hold up beautifully and stay brand new looking...can't do better than Kohler! Our other seats are soft close and we recommend those on frequently used toilets...purchased this for private guest bath seldom used.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Woman

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine seat if you are installing without additional riser
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine seat if you are installing without additional riser, but the hinges are cheap plastic and are not fully rounded or in a complete circle and you must use a plastic fitting that they provide to install. If you want to add a riser and need to use a different bolt, you are out of luck. Ended up with a low end Bemis seat with a plastic hinge with a simple circle hole cut out that I drilled out to the size of the larger bolt and it worked out fine. Had to return the Kohler.
customer_reviews.author: nancy yoon

customer_reviews.title: Well made and designed toilet seat.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time and in excellent condition. The Kohler seat is extremely well made. I have little knowledge on how to projects, however, the toilet seat was so easy for me to install, thank you. I especially like the metal screw that holds the seat in place. I have two other seats that that are very inferior to the Kohler. I definitely will be replacing the other seats. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Slip-Sliding-Away!
customer_reviews.text: Can't recommend this one. The mounting hardware/design was very disappointing. No matter how much I tightened the screws, the lid would not stay secure to the toilet. I opted for an American Standard.
customer_reviews.author: H.S. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I purchased a seat cover that costed more from out of my local Walmart. A complete waste of my money. I am so glad I saw this item online. Its a great price, its sturdy and easy to clean. It looks decent and I am no longer sliding off the toilet onto the floor now! But seriously a good product for the low.
customer_reviews.author: Author Tiffany Forbes and Book Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but fuctional
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install but also very flimsy. Eeek! Makes a cheap, slappy, plastic sound when the lid goes down because it's really thin cheap plastic. The seat is very flimsy and makes cheap, creaky plastic squeaks when you sit on it. Oh lord. So cheap, but hey, it works...for now. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Puppers

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS PIECE OF CRAP!!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS PIECE OF CRAP!!! I bought this item because of the Kohler name, which usually represents quality. First the wing nut is a 'plastic piece if crap'. It after two tightens in less than one week it broke. Second the toilet seat itself is the most uncomfortable seat ever. After two weeks it's going on the trash! Kohler are you kidding?
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet seat is great but mounting it was difficult. I spent a good few minutes trying to tighten the bolt to the screw and it refused to attach. I'm an out of the thinker and turned the bolts upside down and it screwed in just fine and held securely. I replaced 4 seats in my house in a matter of 3 to 4 minutes each and they’re all perfect and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Seat
customer_reviews.text: Already thinking of replacing its. Flimsy. The little tabs that hide the screws have already snapped off. Light use, just me. Nothing that could justify it falling apart so quickly. Better to spend a little more and get something that will last more than six months.
customer_reviews.author: PippiSue

customer_reviews.title: Buy something better
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased 2 of these and while they look OK the construction and mounting points seemed very flimsy compared to other more expensive Kohler toilet seats. After only a few months of very light use the hinge has broken on one. These were cheap but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: DenM

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than 30 days where lid connects to seat. Not impressed. Update: I contacted Kohler they sent a replacement right away. There have been no issues with replacement, initial one must have been defective. I updated to 5 stars due to excellent customer service and no issue with the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: April & Maura

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This seat lid is attached with cheap nylon pins. It was easy to put on, easy to clean but within a month someone had sat on the seat with the lid down and the pins snapped. Found it is easy to remove as well when i replaced with a much better made seat of a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Quite Comfortable On The Arse
customer_reviews.text: I mean come on. We spend alot on time on the throne right? some seats are just uncomfortable. sometimes u arent aware until u get up. this one is not as expensive but comfy. u'll have to be careful when fastening it as the plastic may splay, but just go easy while hand tightening.
customer_reviews.author: F150 Guy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - hinge broke in one month
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toilet seat one month ago for my new apartment. The instal was easy. But a month later, the right hinge has broken. The toilet seat I had at my old apartment lasted for 10 years and was purchased at Home Depot. Heading back there for a new one. Don’t buy this seat.
customer_reviews.author: NewDogOwner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the quality of Kohler products. I purchased a cheaper toilet seat at a local box store and within 6 weeks the entire seat had peeling paint (to my surprise it was painted wood even though it felt to me molded poly or plastic) I’ve had this seat a year now and it’s held up well. Functions as new. I like the soft, slow lid closure. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SevenGoats

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: The hinges fell apart upon opening the package, and continue to not stay together during assembly. You even have to install plastic seat inserts under the lid; which was apparently an after thought by the manufacturer. The description is incomplete unlike the ones that are molded wood, which is spelled out in the description, this should say “plastic”
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: Color and fit are perfect! Good price too.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Bisque color to match the bowl. Plastic seat is easy to install and fits well. It is not as sturdy as wood but it won't tarnish or fade either so it comes down to preference. I have both wood and plastic seats and find the plastic looks newer longer.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: My son for some reason breaks toilet seats frequently so until he moves out some day when he is an adult and after college, I'm not buying an expensive seat. I digress, this is slightly too narrow for the bowl but not noticeable to anyone other than me because I just notice that sort of thing. Pretty easy to install. Very basic but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Calajane

customer_reviews.title: Not the strongest, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I knew when I purchased this that it wouldn't be the best quality. I needed something cheap and fast to replace our toilet seat. The seat you sit on is just fine. If you are short and have young children, the lid is more flimsy. I don't expect it to last for as long as a more expensive product, but it will last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lynz

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware......you get what you pay for in basic toilet seat/cover......
customer_reviews.text: Very nice seat and cover made of plastic (seat) and wood (cover). The weak link is the plastic connecting hardware between the two. I bought 2 of these to replace aging equipment in my two bathrooms, and one of them promptly broke when the lid cover was dropped harshly. Tried to get replacement parts kit for just the plastic that broke and there is no such thing available that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. No instructions and once we figured out the seat is not stable when siting or outing the kid up and down. Spend $5 and get a normal seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Sorry at first, happy at last with product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toilet seat in July from Amazon’s site. It was easy to assemble and install. After a few days the lid kept coming off. I rated the product poorly initially. Amazon suggested I contact the manufacturer directly about my product issue. contacted Kohler and they sent a replacement. The replacement seat had an additional part that was missing from the first seat I ordered. The lid stays on and I am thoroughly satisfied with my product and Kohler’s quick response. I have used Kohler brand products almost exclusively for the past 20 years. I continue to be a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia D Webster

customer_reviews.title: Color matches exactly, but less sturdy than the seat it replaces
customer_reviews.text: The existing toilet seat on one of our Kohler toilets cracked for no apparent reason. On the positive side this seat matches the color of the toilet exactly. On the negative side it is significantly thinner and less sturdy than the original.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reubush

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but NOT sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This toilet seat looks pretty but it is not very sturdy. After 2 weeks the lid hinge broke. Also when you sit down on it bends in the center. If you just need something cheap and pretty this will do. But if you need sturdiness this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat from Kohler at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this seat and at less than half the cost of what the store would have charged me. Their Kohler seat would have taken a week and a half to order in and I'd then have had to go to the store to pick it up. This one came in 2 days with Prime. Also a nice feature is it has a device on the bolts that helps keep them from loosening up as they did on other seats I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: its  OK
customer_reviews.text: As a seat for a toilet it is fine.... I mean it's a seat for a toilet what more do you want??? BUT the nuts provided to secure the seat down where a complete waist of time. They did not even hold the threads of the provided bolts, (to big) . I had to use my own nuts and washers to secure seat, that is why I only gave it 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Spirit

customer_reviews.title: A better value than I found at home Depot. Beginning of
customer_reviews.text: I think that this is an outstanding value I had brought in a replacement one from home Depot and it was cheaply made. And cracked it for about 6 months of use. This is 100% plastic and seems to be rather well made lighter weight and I'm pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: David Struss

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my old toilet seat. And I got this one online and it’s so easy to install. You just screw it in and the lid is light weight and doesn’t make a loud noise when you close it. Shipped very quickly and it was very cheap and a good brand to get!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Mead

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & over designed, missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived missing a critical piece - a black piece of platic that holds the hinge in place. This is completely over designed and over complicated. I couldn’t get a replacement part for what I was missing, and now have to special order one. No wonder it’s cheap, it uses all rejected parts from other designs.
customer_reviews.author: Erin V. Zebrowski

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Basic plastic toilet seat that doesn't seem durable. We have had a couple of months and it didn't last. The attachment on one side is broken. If you use the bathroom toilet often, this seat just doesn't last. It is cheap but you get what you pay for. Doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Lovz 2 Shop

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get on and won't stay up. I have to warn all men who come over! I'm a handy girl and this toilet seat was hard to install. Plastic is really flimsy feeling too. Disappointed in a Kohler product.
customer_reviews.author: Ocedropan

customer_reviews.title: I have a Koehler toilet which I'm pleased with making me even more surprised with this seats ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a toilet seat, so my expectations were rather low. I have a Koehler toilet which I'm pleased with making me even more surprised with this seats performance. Cons - the quick release feature means the seat is pulledout of position often. - the seat doesn't sit even on the toilet. - when you sit on the toilet with the lid closed, the lid slides over. Pros - it covers the toilet. - the quick release feature is nice for cleaning I would NOT recommend this seat and I will never buy Koehler again.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Seat is fine quick release allows seat to slide SLIDE SLIDE BACK AND FORTH
customer_reviews.text: Kohler quick release seats suck, look elsewhere they slide side to side due to cheap plastic clips, i have installed 3 in house each twice over, so yes i installed correctly, dont screw down with the seat clips on ......
customer_reviews.author: bigtuna

customer_reviews.title: the toilet seat was very easy to attach to the toilet
customer_reviews.text: I also have a Kohler wood toilet seat with white coating. In comparison, this one feels light and seems to have some give to it when I sit on it. I guess that's what I should expect for under $17. The center hole in the seat seems a bit large as well. However, the toilet seat was very easy to attach to the toilet. Plus the quick-release assembly for cleaning makes up for the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money. Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! It is a waste of money it falls apart very easily you can’t sit on it without the lid falling off it is so substandard that I couldn’t really give it one star but that zero stars was not a choice. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: I replaced our old Kohler wooden toilet seat because cleaners like Lysol were harming the finish. The hardware for this is definitely different than that of the old one, but I had no problem with it. Literally took me minutes to un-install the old and install the new. If any issues arise, I will update my review. Peace.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Jo '77

customer_reviews.title: Classy and secure connection
customer_reviews.text: Classy and secure connection. I would try to leave on the plastic while you install it to avoid scratching lid. They both connection is a full cover I thought it hinged little tricky popping off. Insert they both connection is a full cover I thought it hinged little tricky popping off. Insert bowl bolt and hold in place with Phillips screwdriver while turning white Underneath on Pult pointy part goes up as it fills the whole of toilet that's what makes it so secure and not shifting. Once hand tight then hold white but not with hand and tighten a bit with screwdriver. Looks excellent and a bathroom with black-and-white theme.
customer_reviews.author: J. Raven

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning, looks great, comfort is so-so.
customer_reviews.text: I like how easily it attaches and comes off. For ease of deep cleanings. Mine did come with a little ding in it. And it isn't very comfortable for the wider hipped bottoms for prolonged sitting. But it's not terrible either. It looks very nice, and I really love the ease in cleaning. I would probably buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Maybet

customer_reviews.title: It’s a toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lol what do you say about a toilet seat? Oh super easy to install, sat in closet for months so I finally did it myself. Hubby was shocked.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Included hardware is too cheap
customer_reviews.text: The seat itself is great, however, the fasteners for the seat itself are really poor quality and an extremely flawed design. After tightening, one of the "nuts" popped completely off the bolt after a few uses and now will no longer tighten enough to securely hold the seat in position. Going to have to replace them all together.
customer_reviews.author: Hamiltonzth

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: The original seat to my Kohler elongated toilet cracked (no jokes, please) so I had to purchase a replacement. This fits and functions as advertised, and looks like the old one. But, it's cheap, is all. Spend a little more and get the quiet close model, which is more along the line of what came with the toilet. Just a suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: This toilet seat looks great and the installation was a breeze
customer_reviews.text: This toilet seat looks great and the installation was a breeze. It took less than 5 minutes to swap out this seat for the old one and it works perfectly on my elongated toilet. The quick release feature is very nice for cleaning. I removed one star because the seat does feel a bit flimsy compared to my other toilet seat and I am a little worried about long term durability.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, super sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through so many toilet seats in this household in which the bolts would come loose, it was difficult to clean, it wasn't sturdy or comfortable, etc. So far, this seat hasn't caused us any issues. It was easy to install, it's comfortable enough to sit on to do your business, and it cleans up SO nicely. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. This toilet seat never stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. This toilet seat never stays in place. I have re-installed it 4 or 5 times and it only sits tight in its place for a day or two max before it becomes loose again. The seat actually looks good and the material seems of quality but it just never stays in place so what purpose does it serve?
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: NOT a slow close
customer_reviews.text: My mistake! I did not read closely enough. Did not realize this was not a slow close. When you lift it up it slams. When you drop it it slams..... like really slams. The lid is made of a relatively cheap feeling plastic. Seat is sturdy. Okay for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. COOK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low low cost toilet seat!  As expected and described.
customer_reviews.text: No pieces were missing. I installed the seat in under 2 minutes. I used this to replace an equally cheap seat I have been sitting on for several years. Breaking down and tossing all the shipping packaging will be the only thing I did not like about this transaction. I will update if anything sh*tty or catastrophic happens.
customer_reviews.author: thx, charles

customer_reviews.title: Great place to sit
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable toilet seat, the only thing that I wish was better was the bolts that it came with to fasten it to the toilet. They're pretty flimsy/fragile and if you sit down on the toilet hard a lot (or have a bidet attachment) they will likely break/bend and make your seat super loose. Just something to think about
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Seat fits perfectly and looks good. Negative is mounting brackets are not holes in ...
customer_reviews.text: Seat fits perfectly and looks good. Negative is mounting brackets are not holes in seat, but u shaped. Screws go in this black plastic clip and when tightening spread the u shaped seat hole apart. This isn't as secure as the old seat which had holes in the seat that won't spread apart when tightening. When installing be careful not to tighten too tight. Other than that seat stays and really doesn't move , but would have preferred a more solid mounting bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: soild plastic
customer_reviews.text: The last seats I have had were painted and in time cleaning and polishing them the paint wears off. They used to give lifetime guarantee's on them . This one is great, shiny white plastic easy to clean. I received a second one and it is even nicer that the first has an upgraded improved design .
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: TOILET SEAT
customer_reviews.text: I HAD TO SEND THIS ONE BACK. I HAD ORDERED THE WRONG DESIGN. YOU MUST MEASURE YOUR SEAT TO MAKE SURE IT WILL FIT YOUR'S. I LEARNED THE HARD WAY, I THOUGHT MY TOILET WAS OVAL, BUT IT WAS NOT. DON'T MAKE THE SAME ERROR I MADE. MEASURE FOR THE RIGHT SIZE.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Spears

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: This non-breakable toilet seat is a great design and easy to care for. It's not heavyweight, however. Except for being a little to lightweight, it's just the right looks and materials.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elongated raised toilets! Great price! Easy to clean and maintain! Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for round toilets with elongated raised equipment. It was a bit hard to install, but once in place it's been a big help! It fits the toilet just fine. My cleaning staff loves how easy it is to clean! For those who must use toilet raising equipment it's a life saver! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Kohler toilet and of course 35 days after i bought it the connector on the right side split. Missed the 30 day return window.So now i have a $25 dollar hillbilly picture frame. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Sookie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all for price.
customer_reviews.text: Much heavier than I expected for the price. Easy for even me..a woman to install. Includes screw bolts and nuts. Nut that goes under toilet has a flange that you can hold with hand while tightening which made it super easy for me. Happy with purchase. Almond color matches very well.
customer_reviews.author: Harvest

customer_reviews.title: OK.
customer_reviews.text: After this purchase, discovered Costco has a similar seat with soft close for about the same price, so it does not slam shut like this one does. otherwise it is a great seat, does scuff easily though, that is plastic for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer IAEN

customer_reviews.title: This is made of cheap plastic. Lasted less than ...
customer_reviews.text: This is made of cheap plastic. Lasted less than 2 weeks before one of the back clasps completely broke off. Not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fits Koehler toilets from the nineties
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Koehler toilet which is from the 1990s. Wasn’t sure that I would find a replacement seat but this fits perfectly except that it is a little off-center and the hardware would not allow me to do the fine adjustment needed to perfectly center it. But that was not a critical adjustment as you would have to look really closely to see the minor misalignment.
customer_reviews.author: Gen 3+

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Finally a toilet seat that works properly with quick release, as described is one of the benefits I see of this is to be able to clean properly I would highly recommend this As an update to my REVIEW , THIS PRODUCT DID NOT HOLD UP AS I AMBA 1 person household and am of average weight 6/1/2019 updated
customer_reviews.author: Pinhead954

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: the mounting kit is below par. i'm actually disappointed in Kohler. I gave them a call directly and there is no solution that they offer for this product. you will never get this seat secured. it will always wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Tishie Felts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the elongated one. It is better then the previous deep seat that I had before. Very easy to install and no need for proffesional to do it for you. Just follow the instructions on the box. Excellent price for the quality wise
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expect from Koehler  I will stick to Bemis
customer_reviews.text: We have a Kohler toilet and sink and this is the right color but it is thin plastic, sounds cheap when you close it and has a funny shape to the seat. I ordered the Bemis for half the price and will replace this when I have time. It is, however, an adequate toilet seat and installs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is basically the worst toilet seat I've ever sat on. It doesn't attach tightly to the toilet, so it moves from side to side constantly. It also has that cheap public toilet seat feel when you sit on it. Buy a better one!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Kantar

customer_reviews.title: Its a pretty nice toilet seat.
customer_reviews.text: What You see is what you get. Easy install. It does come with some little rubber feet that help grip the seat to the toilet. However the 4 star rating is because it is attached to the bolts with special adapters so you can easily remove the seat for cleaning. Cool idea but I am worried that over time this could wear and perhaps cause the seat to slip off when someone is using it. Time will tell I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Mann

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic breaks easily. Koehler is not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: Previous toilet seat lasted 30 years. This one broke in just months. Flimsy plastic key ways that hold the lid on cracked almost immediately and now the lid is completely disconnected. What’s the point of fixing it just to have it break again in 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Luke SF

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is a piece of crap. One of the plastic screws wasn't even out of the mold when we opened the plastic wrap. The screw broke as we tried to remove the extra molding. The seat keeps coming off as the mounting snaps keep popping off. This is a piece of crap. I wasted $15 because I can't even return it, all due to manufacturer error. Do not buy! I could've just bought the seat I saw for $6 at Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Kohler’s Best Moment
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for applies here - but regardless, it’s still disappointing to see Kohler put out such a poorly designed and assembled product. Nothing good to say here - returned on day one.
customer_reviews.author: MtnGirl

customer_reviews.title: Works and functions as a toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: I was missing the hardware that is supposed to come with it but I found some in my garage and was able to install it. The old plastic hardware would not fit. It bends when I sit on it but not enough to warrant a complaint. Will see how it holds up over time
customer_reviews.author: S. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was convenient to find this item at such a good price and it be prime delivered however you can go to Lowe’s and find sturdier ones for the same price. The lid is plastic and I feel will break easily.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace the same model we had for 6 years. Believe me, IT'S NOT THE SAME! Cheap-feel, lightweight, uncomfortable, plastic. Terribly disappointed. You get what you pay for. 🤔 DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D. Almond

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP WITH QUALITY !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the least expensive and a Kohler to boot !!! Very comfy. My feet don't fall asleep !!!! Actually has metal bolts they're all plastic these days, that's why they don't last. This is sturdy !!!!! Cheap and quality what a deal !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Loy

product_meta.title: Kohler K-4774-0 Brevia Elongated White Toilet Seatwith Quick-Release Hinges And Quick-Attach Hardware For Easy Clean
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:Elongated Toilet SeatEngineered to ensure a proper fit on one and two piece toilets, this Brevia seat complements a wide variety of elongated toilet designs. Sturdy plastic construction resists staining, chipping, and fading, while the ergonomically contoured seat enhances comfort. This seat features innovative technology that simplifies both cleaning and installation.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Brevia elongated toilet seat delivers value to the consumer with features that include seats that remove easily for cleaning and hardware that speeds installation and helps prevent the seats from loosening. The Brevia was engineered to ensure a prope.
feature_bullets: Materials: Solid polypropylene plastic to resist staining, chipping, and fading
Quick release hinges allow seat to be unlatched from toilet for easy removal and convenient cleaning; No tools required
Quick attach hardware for fast and secure installation. Seat-mounting holes: 5-1/2 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,987 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
